item.title: Guest list CBI director files affidavit in SC
item.description: CBI director Ranjit Sinha on Friday questioned the maintainability of activist organisation Centre for Public Interest and Litigations application asking the SC to remove him from supervising the 2G spectrum probe
item.itunes:subtitle: CBI director Ranjit Sinha on Friday questioned the maintainability of activist organisation Centre for Public Interest and Litigations application asking the SC to remove him from supervising the 2G spectrum probe
item.itunes:summary: CBI director Ranjit Sinha on Friday questioned the maintainability of activist organisation Centre for Public Interest and Litigations application asking the SC to remove him from supervising the 2G spectrum probe

item.title: Calcutta HC quashes rape charges against Pinki Pramanicknbsp
item.description: Calcutta high court on Friday shot down the rape and other criminal charges against the international athlete Pinki Pramanick slapped by the Baguihati police in a chargesheet last year
item.itunes:subtitle: Calcutta high court on Friday shot down the rape and other criminal charges against the international athlete Pinki Pramanick slapped by the Baguihati police in a chargesheet last year
item.itunes:summary: Calcutta high court on Friday shot down the rape and other criminal charges against the international athlete Pinki Pramanick slapped by the Baguihati police in a chargesheet last year

item.title: Nariman slams Modi govt as majoritarian
item.description: Sparks flew as Fali Nariman chose to be unpopular rather than untruthful called the current government majoritarian highlighted repeated instances of hate speech and indicated the Commission was failing to discharge its responsibility
item.itunes:subtitle: Sparks flew as Fali Nariman chose to be unpopular rather than untruthful called the current government majoritarian highlighted repeated instances of hate speech and indicated the Commission was failing to discharge its responsibility
item.itunes:summary: Sparks flew as Fali Nariman chose to be unpopular rather than untruthful called the current government majoritarian highlighted repeated instances of hate speech and indicated the Commission was failing to discharge its responsibility

item.title: TMC has not taken a penny from Saradha Mamata
item.description: Breaking her silence after a barrage of accusations and the arrest of a Trinamool leader by CBI over the past few days West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee claimed on Friday that her party has not taken a penny from Saradha
item.itunes:subtitle: Breaking her silence after a barrage of accusations and the arrest of a Trinamool leader by CBI over the past few days West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee claimed on Friday that her party has not taken a penny from Saradha
item.itunes:summary: Breaking her silence after a barrage of accusations and the arrest of a Trinamool leader by CBI over the past few days West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee claimed on Friday that her party has not taken a penny from Saradha

item.title: Cong banks on MNS to fight BJP in Maharashtra
item.description: After a severe drubbing in Lok Sabha elections in Maharashtra the Congress is reworking its strategy for the upcoming assembly polls in the state that it has ruled in coalition with the Nationalist Congress Party since 1999
item.itunes:subtitle: After a severe drubbing in Lok Sabha elections in Maharashtra the Congress is reworking its strategy for the upcoming assembly polls in the state that it has ruled in coalition with the Nationalist Congress Party since 1999
item.itunes:summary: After a severe drubbing in Lok Sabha elections in Maharashtra the Congress is reworking its strategy for the upcoming assembly polls in the state that it has ruled in coalition with the Nationalist Congress Party since 1999

item.title: Irrespective of result Mainpuri poised to script electoral history
item.description: If the Bharatiya Janata Party BJP wins it will be the first victory or the BJP or its former avatar the Jan Sangh in the parliamentary constituency since the first postindependence general election in 195152
item.itunes:subtitle: If the Bharatiya Janata Party BJP wins it will be the first victory or the BJP or its former avatar the Jan Sangh in the parliamentary constituency since the first postindependence general election in 195152
item.itunes:summary: If the Bharatiya Janata Party BJP wins it will be the first victory or the BJP or its former avatar the Jan Sangh in the parliamentary constituency since the first postindependence general election in 195152

item.title: Forest guards boats coax Chauburji villagers to vote
item.description: The sevenkilomtere path walk from Chauburji village to Suratnagar in Nighasan assembly segment through the forest is fraught with danger full of elephants tigers leopards and hyenas
item.itunes:subtitle: The sevenkilomtere path walk from Chauburji village to Suratnagar in Nighasan assembly segment through the forest is fraught with danger full of elephants tigers leopards and hyenas
item.itunes:summary: The sevenkilomtere path walk from Chauburji village to Suratnagar in Nighasan assembly segment through the forest is fraught with danger full of elephants tigers leopards and hyenas

item.title: Spotlight on Telangana CM in Medak bypolls
item.description: The bypoll in Medak is necessitated by the resignation of TRS chief K Chandrasekhara Rao who chose to retain the Gajwel assembly seat falling within the Lok Sabha constituency to become the first chief minister of Telangana

item.title: SC for promotion reservation of differently abled
item.description: The Supreme Court on Friday held the differently abled persons should be given reservation in promotion while expressing dismay that successive governments had failed to implement the law to protect the rights of disabled in letter and spirit

item.title: Prosecute Saradha scam accused Govt
item.description: Within days of the Serious Fraud Investigation Office SFIO submitting its report on the Saradha scam the government on Friday has given the goahead for the prosecution of those nailed in the report top government sources told HT

item.title: Tara shahdeo case Three judges interrogated
item.description: Ranchi police on Friday questioned three senior judicial officials in connection with a case of forced conversion to Islam brought by Tara Shahdeo against her husband a rare instance of serving judicial officers being interrogated in a criminal case
item.itunes:subtitle: Ranchi police on Friday questioned three senior judicial officials in connection with a case of forced conversion to Islam brought by Tara Shahdeo against her husband a rare instance of serving judicial officers being interrogated in a criminal case
item.itunes:summary: Ranchi police on Friday questioned three senior judicial officials in connection with a case of forced conversion to Islam brought by Tara Shahdeo against her husband a rare instance of serving judicial officers being interrogated in a criminal case

item.title: On a different pitch Yuvraj meets Shah sets off campaigning role buzz
item.description: Cricketer Yuvraj Singh on Friday met BJP president Amit Shah in Delhi triggering speculation that he may campaign for the party in Haryana which goes to polls on October 15
item.itunes:subtitle: Cricketer Yuvraj Singh on Friday met BJP president Amit Shah in Delhi triggering speculation that he may campaign for the party in Haryana which goes to polls on October 15
item.itunes:summary: Cricketer Yuvraj Singh on Friday met BJP president Amit Shah in Delhi triggering speculation that he may campaign for the party in Haryana which goes to polls on October 15

item.title: It had 12 hours to save lives but state govt kept sleeping
item.description: The governments indifference towards disaster management and years of neglect were the main reasons for the havoc wreaked by floods in the Kashmir Valley that have claimed more than 200 lives experts say
item.itunes:subtitle: The governments indifference towards disaster management and years of neglect were the main reasons for the havoc wreaked by floods in the Kashmir Valley that have claimed more than 200 lives experts say
item.itunes:summary: The governments indifference towards disaster management and years of neglect were the main reasons for the havoc wreaked by floods in the Kashmir Valley that have claimed more than 200 lives experts say

item.title: 2G Kamal Nath says Manmohan may have erred
item.description: After exCAG Vinod Rai attacked Manmohan Singh over 2G Congress leader Kamal Nath spelt more embarrassment for the party His remarks came even as several Congress leaders defended Singh
item.itunes:subtitle: After exCAG Vinod Rai attacked Manmohan Singh over 2G Congress leader Kamal Nath spelt more embarrassment for the party His remarks came even as several Congress leaders defended Singh
item.itunes:summary: After exCAG Vinod Rai attacked Manmohan Singh over 2G Congress leader Kamal Nath spelt more embarrassment for the party His remarks came even as several Congress leaders defended Singh

item.title: Coming soon A slice of New Yorks landmark Times Square in Mumbai
item.description: Mumbais cultural centrepiece Kala Ghoda will soon mirror the magic of Times Square with street acts vibrant lights film cartoon characters and giant electronic billboards the government said on Friday
item.itunes:subtitle: Mumbais cultural centrepiece Kala Ghoda will soon mirror the magic of Times Square with street acts vibrant lights film cartoon characters and giant electronic billboards the government said on Friday
item.itunes:summary: Mumbais cultural centrepiece Kala Ghoda will soon mirror the magic of Times Square with street acts vibrant lights film cartoon characters and giant electronic billboards the government said on Friday
